item.title: Environmental Performance Index - Simple Scatter Plot
item.description: Table contained 180 countries with some numerics values for Environment Performance Index, “Enviornmental Health”, “Ecosystem Vitality”. I thought it would be interesting to plot them using ggplot2. So when it comes to ranking in 2018, Top 5 countries are 1. Switzlerland, 2. France, 3. Denmark, 4. Malta, 5. Sweden. Bottom 5 countries for 2018 are , 180. Burundi, 179. Bangladesh, 178. Dem. Rep.Congo, 177. India, 176.…
